item.title: Dart - Use late allocation if possible
item.description: Dart v2.9 added the late modifier on variables. When Null Safety is enabled, it is sometimes necessary to explicitly state that we will initialize a non-null variable later. Dart cannot always assume that a variable will be initialized later, as in the case of high-level variables. The following example would throw an error in Dart. This can be used in the following two cases. Late assign: promise to assign later
